- Sylvester
- Tweety
- Granny
- Bugs
- Sam
- Daffy (as Duck Dodgers)
- Foghorn
- Porky
- Petunia

Each character appears in only one title among those released on March 31, 2004. Therefore, no character appears in more than one title for that release date.

   - Row 4 (index 4): Characters are Foghorn

The relevant cells for verification are in the "characters" column of rows with index 1 to 5.
